pr_title: DEV-1194: Use SAGE as somatic caller in HG38

timeline.message: DEV-1194: Use SAGE as somatic caller in HG38

timeline.bodyText: Thinking a better place for this would be in the shouldRun method of the somatic caller. Just that we don't have any other logic in this class and its also hard to unit test it.
timeline.author: pauldwolfe
